extendedInfo.description: Multi BetLine Slot Machine is a simulated casino slot machine game, which is different than normal slots. In this game, you can place a bet on multiple bet lines and use online features to send instant messages to other players and discuss gaming tips.To place a bet, press Single line or All lines. You can bet a maximum 3 coins on each line. On winning, the credits for all lines are accumulated and declared as winner paid.The game has a shake feature. To spin slot wheels, shake the phone or press SPIN.To ON/OFF sound effect tap settings button in the popup dialog, choose appropriate options.To submit your score on score leaderboard, press STAR.The game has multi skins. to select a skin, press Settings.The game has a score backup and restore feature. You can restore previous accumulated credits when you change a handset or re-install a game.CHALLENGES feature - You can play challenge games of 50, 100, 200 spins, submit score challenge for other players to beat the score. Challenge individual players on a 1 to 1 Challenge.COIN Store feature â You can transfer your credits in a coin store and use them in other Tidda games and show your achievement in the millionaire list. The coin store can be invoked by pressing COIN in the main screen.HOLD and NUDGE Wheels and try to match symbols and win more.Tips and tricks feature â You can use this feature to share your gaming tips with other players.Bonus games Video Poker, Blackjack, Scratch card, Roulette, and Gold Run.Surprise GIFTS, gifts are given in every 3 hour, get more credits through gifts.The game has a social platform HeyZap. You can also submit your score on Facebook and Twitter to show your achievement to your friends.*SUPPORT*For suggestions, feature request, score restore, and so you, contact support@tiddagames.com.Search tags: multi betline slotmachine Casino Slots Vegas Room Cherry Money Bet Gamble Gambling Fruit Coin Chip Royal Cash Score Jackpot Seven Gold Wheel Fortune Video Luck Million Billion Top Chart Reel Video Free Royale Shop bonus Facebook highest farm players paying machines gold coin store virtual Frenzy Crazy Addictive money pirates pusher treasures collection multiple single Super Fun Riches Multi Cell Betlines Progressive Wheel Spin Fortune Black Mini Spider Game Super Video Slots tilt nudge hold mini games free coins extra chart top buster farm social casino mini bonus video poker blackjack roulette scratch card Gold run hold nudge
